content: The soil at my place is really fertile! So if you want somethin' good to eat but don't feel like growin' it yourself... {A期待}I could plant a few right out front, then you could come grab some whenever you like.
info: NPC星湾标签-开关能力1-1010云果_1010-云果

content: Have you seen the sproutsies I grew by my house mah? They look super yummy, don't they~! Don't forget to harvest them. Well mah... can I keep growin' more?
info: NPC星湾标签-开关能力1-1010云果_1010-云果

content: {A歪头}Then, lemme know when you're craving something. I'll plant them outside my place, so you can pick and snack on them anytime.
info: NPC星湾标签-开关能力1-1010云果_1010-云果

content: Let's stop for now. I have other plans.
info: NPC星湾标签-开关能力1-1010云果_1010-云果

content: {A歪头}Yeee? Okey dokey, I'll go move the sproutsies back inside right now. Just hold on a sec, I'll be quick!
info: NPC星湾标签-开关能力1-1010云果_1010-云果

content: {A期待}Okey dokey! I'm gonna move all the sproutsies outside right away. Hopefully, a lickle more space'll help them grow better.
